title: When was this Coke ad painted?
content:
I have a bet going with a friend as to what year this Coca Cola ad was painted. There are two ads painted over each other, we’re only interested in the Cocal Cola one.

It’s on the corner of West Broadway and Canal Street in SoHo, Manhattan.

Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042516im_/http:/typophile.com/files/coke_4009.jpg)

 [‹ [cartoon] How to become a famous blogger](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042516/http:/typophile.com/node/38257 "Go to previous forum topic") [Best font of the 70's? opinions please! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042516/http:/typophile.com/node/38065 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cubanica

comments.content:
I don’t think it’s the same ad, but this is similar and in the same area, and from 1910.

[http://www.frankjump.com/020.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042516/http:/www.frankjump.com/020.html "http://www.frankjump.com/020.html")

These guys may be able to help - provide paid consultation... [http://www.signmuseum.org/faq/faq.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042516/http:/www.signmuseum.org/faq/faq.html "http://www.signmuseum.org/faq/faq.html")
